mapper.insert: INSERT INTO schedule ( schedule_title, schedule_description, schedule_start_date, schedule_end_date, semester_type ) VALUES ( #{scheduleTitle}, #{scheduleDescription}, #{scheduleStartDate}, #{scheduleEndDate}, #{semesterType} )
mapper.update: UPDATE schedule SET schedule_title = #{scheduleTitle}, schedule_description = #{scheduleDescription}, schedule_start_date = #{scheduleStartDate}, schedule_end_date = #{scheduleEndDate}, semester_type = #{semesterType} WHERE schedule_id = #{scheduleId}
mapper.select: SELECT schedule_id, schedule_title, schedule_description, schedule_start_date, schedule_end_date, semester_type FROM schedule WHERE schedule_id = #{scheduleId}
